title: How to Create Booking Confirmation Templates
description: Send professional confirmations that reduce cancellations and set expectations.

steps.title: Create your confirmation template
steps.description: Use ChatGPT to write a professional confirmation message.
substeps: Type: 'Write a friendly booking confirmation text for a [your trade] appointment. Include: date, time, address, what to expect, and contact number. Keep it professional but warm.'
Review and adjust to match your style
steps.tip: Keep it short — long confirmations don't get read.

steps.title: Include the essential details
steps.description: Every confirmation should have these elements.
substeps: Date and time of the appointment
Service address (even if you think they know it)
Any prep they need to do (clear the area, be home, etc.)

steps.title: Save it for easy access
steps.description: Store your template where you can grab it fast.
substeps: iPhone: Create a text replacement in Settings → General → Keyboard → Text Replacement
Type shortcut like 'conf1' that expands to your full message
Or save it in Notes and copy-paste each time
steps.tip: The goal is sending a confirmation in under 30 seconds.

steps.title: Set up automatic confirmations (optional)
steps.description: Let your booking tool send them for you.
substeps: Calendly/Jobber/HouseCall Pro: Go to notification settings

steps.title: Use the template every time
steps.description: Make confirmation part of your booking process.
substeps: Every time you schedule a job, send the confirmation immediately
Don't wait — send it while you're still on the phone with them
Ask them to confirm receipt: 'Did you get my text?'

successMessage: You now have a professional confirmation template! Customers feel taken care of and cancellations drop.
proTips: Confirmation = commitment. Customers who confirm are much less likely to cancel.
Include 'Reply YES to confirm' — it increases show rates
Send confirmation via text AND email for important jobs
